post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
There was the first soft Skills seminar last summer. I had promised that I am going to have the second session. I think I am ready to deliver like I had promised.
I like to combine different topics into a presentation. I have been running for some time and also took the class from the community center "How to Run". The class consisted of 10 different sessions. That meant I need to be with the total strangers for 10 different occasions. I like to present what transpired during 10 weeks. I like to compare my experience with other situation.
Agenda ======= 1. How to run <li> 10 weeks programs <li> mental status <li> what do we gain other than just good health
2. Soft Skills <li> why do we have difficult to communicate with the strangers ? <li> mental blocks <li> 10 weeks transition of people <li> how do we teach our children about the soft skills
3. Discussion of our X-mas party
Details ---------------------- - Date and Time : Dec 13th 8:00 PM - Location : 황성규씨집 (19 Moresby St. Richmond Hill, ON)
List of Names (password: 1) ------------ 1.Thomas Lee 2.Spencer Hwang 3. A.Sheen. ( 13th Friday? Some scary things will happen?...) 4. 김종윤 + 신규전산이민자 친구 5. 홍영기 6. 서정민 7. 강윤정 8. 이준호 9. 이계영 10. 11. 12. 13. 14. 15.
post.title: 세미나 Dec.13 금요일: How to run + Soft Skills 2
